original_text: to escape the Babylonians. They were afraid of them because Ishmael son of Nethaniah had killed Gedaliah son of Ahikam, whom the king of Babylon had appointed as governor over the land.
korean_text: 이는 느다냐의 아들 이스마엘이 바벨론의 왕이 그 땅을 위임한 아히감의 아들 그다랴를 죽였으므로 그들이 갈대아 사람을 두려워함이었더라

sentences.original_text: because Ishmael son of Nethaniah had killed Gedaliah
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 네타냐의 아들 이스마엘이 그다랴를 죽였기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: whom the king of Babylon had appointed as governor
